questionTitle: When ____________ you ____________ (go) to Rome last year?
He ____________ (work) on the computer at the moment.
What time ____________ he ____________ (arrive) home last Tuesday?
They ____________ (take) their children to Spain last year.
Next Tuesday my brother ____________ (go) to Rome.
Mary ____________ (not, be) at work at the moment. She's at home.
Last winter he ____________ (go) by train from Rome to Paris.
